title: Bon voyage!
body:
Nicole and I are leaving on our first official vacation tomorrow: a week-long cruise with the Chilton family. It ought to be a blast as long as we don't get rained on. It marks the longest we've been away from The Moxie.... EVER! I guess it's long over-due though. Our trusty employees are going to be running the ship while we're away, so make sure you stop in and give them a hard time... just to make sure we're getting our money's worth... NOT! Seriously though, don't bother them. I'll hunt you down and do strange things to your car.

We'll be back next Friday - sunburned, bloated, and fully rested - just in time for the kick-off of David Lynch's INLAND EMPIRE. We're also having a short documentary made about the Moxie that weekend, so the fun will NEVER stop! Ok, I'm excited for our break. It's the first cruise for everyone involved, so I'm sure we'll have a handful of faux pas to share on our return. I feel giddy at the thought of it!!! See you soon!
author: Dan

comments.author: The Four Finger Soc Em
comments.body:
Have fun, kids!







And prepare Dan, for when you return, when the vacation ends... the battle begins. THE BATTLE OF MIDDLE-EARTH DAN VS. MAX IN ALL THINGS MEANT TO BE FUN AND RECREATIONAL (I.E. SEMI-SPORTS SUCH AS PUTT-PUTT, BOWLING, CEREAL EATING).

comments.author: El Brian de Moore
comments.body: my car does strange things... without your help.... thank you very much

comments.author: Cosmik
comments.body: This blog sounds like a photoshop request for bloated, red Danicole photos.  Like Violet Beauregard, only red.

comments.author: nate
comments.body: I'm terrified.

comments.author: Megster
comments.body: have fun!  be sure to put sun screen on your hands, feet, ears and the part line of your hair... (ask max/kelly about what happens if you do not)

comments.author: The Four Finger Soc Em
comments.body:
Posted By: Megster(ask max/kelly about what happens if you do not)

Me and Kelly are not one person.

comments.author: Megster
comments.body:
i am very aware of that.

but you both sunburn strangely.

comments.author: Megster
comments.body: the slash thing means "or"... meaning either of you would be able to tell people about strange sunburning.

comments.author: Cosmik
comments.body: No, but apparently you have shared one skin condition.  :)

comments.author: The Four Finger Soc Em
comments.body: Whatever, bro.

comments.author: The Four Finger Soc Em
comments.body: HOW WAS YOUR TRIP? AWESOME SUNBURNS?

comments.author: dan
comments.body: Good times. No sunburns though... :(

comments.author: Cosmik
comments.body: Gee, don't sound so disappointed Dan.  :)

comments.author: brad
comments.body: you need some freakin sunburns!

comments.author: nate
comments.body: I need some sideburns.

comments.author: Cosmik
comments.body:
You can have some of mine, Nate. I've got extra.

Seriously - I read the two posts above that one as "sideburns" and then had to look again. I"m glad I wasn't (apparently? hopefully) the only one.

comments.author: nicole
comments.body: Yeah, I guess the SPF 45 was a little too effective. But I am five pounds heavier now! Thanks to filet mignons, melting chocolate cake, and 24-hour pizza buffets.

comments.author: The Four Finger Soc Em
comments.body: Only five pounds heavier and no sunburns? You guys didn't live it up enough.

comments.author: Ian
comments.body: 24HOURPIZZABUFFETSGOMZSIGNMEUP

comments.author: Cosmik
comments.body: Can you imagine if CiCi's was open 24-7?
